newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0810 CDT.
LIVE CATTLE - Up 0.100 to off 0.100 cent. May see further technical support but weak tone to cash could press market.
FEEDER CATTLE - Steady to up 0.200 cent. Carryover technical demand and calls for lower corn futures.
LEAN HOGS - Steady to off 0.150 cent. Steady to lower live calls and mostly lower cash pork products.
PORK BELLIES - Up 0.100 to 0.300 cent. Carryover demand and higher product market but may see profit taking.
